alert.note: Alert for Assumption; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; St. Helena; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:18AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Ascension, West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, western St. Helena, Pointe Coupee, northwestern Livingston, East Feliciana, Iberville, East Baton Rouge and Assumption Parishes, Wilkinson and western Amite Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 816 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Big Bend to 22 miles south of Cypremort Point. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Plaquemine, Port Allen, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Clinton, Liberty, Napoleonville, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, White Castle and Centreville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 129 and 178. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Pointe Coupee; St. Helena; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana; Western Ascension
